==Music Compositions==
;Recommended Songs
Displays list of recommended songs created by players. Can be refreshed and filtered by up to 5 tags.

{|class="article-table"
!Group
!Tags
|-
|Note Quality
|More than 500 notes, More than 200 notes, 200 notes or fewer
|-
|Button Layout
|Four notes input, six notes input
|-
|Current Song
|Lustrous Trick, Surasthana Fantasia, Rex Incognito, Any Last Words?, Parousia Diluvi, Se mettre sur son trente-et-un !
|-
|Past Songs
|Blossoms of Summer Night, Time to Shine, Drifter's Destiny, Devotion of the Keeper, Let's Go, Crimson Knight!, Rage Beneath the Mountains, Termination of Desires, Invitation of Windblume, Contemplation in Snow, Dance of Aphros, Caelestinum Finale Termini, Caprice of the Leaves, Winding Through Avidya, Bard's Adventure
|}

;Search songs
Search songs by Sharing Code. Can be sorted by Search Time, Performance Time, or Song Title.

;My Favorites
List of up to 20 songs that have been favorited. Can be sorted by Time Favorited or Song Title.

;Interaction Platform
Opens the [https://act.hoyoverse.com/ys/event/ugc-page-music/index.html?act_id=e202403256887 "Iridescence Tour" Interaction Platform] for user submitted scores. This collection is available for the duration of the event. There is a contest for publishing works with a chance to win gift cards and Primogem rewards. Rules can be seen by clicking the "?" on the page.
